tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HabitatFragmentation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  land_cover_type VARCHAR(50),
  fragment_area FLOAT,
  fragment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE LandCoverData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(50),
  land_cover_type VARCHAR(50),
  area_coverage FLOAT,
  survey_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FragmentationHistory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fragment_id INT,
  fragment_area_before FLOAT,
  fragment_area_after FLOAT,
  fragmentation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FragmentationImpact (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fragment_id INT,
  impact_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FragmentationQueries (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_name VARCHAR(50),
  query_description TEXT,
  query_date DATE
)
